name: Fightcore
description:
This game is also playable in browser via opera's gxc platform.  Here's the link https://gxc.gg/games/jfxco1/Fightcore/tracks/54b78e80-c19e-4392-bb96-12ef08ab27a...

Fight to the beat though different video game worlds. When night arrives, nightcore mode is activated. Making the songs faster, removing the notes guide, and changing the enemies' appearances.

The theme, then the night changed everything, is interpreted in the nightcore levels. Where the songs get a more difficult remix, and enemies/level change their appearance.

Gameplay:

Move between two lanes and punch enemies to the beat. Your left and right fist target different enemies in your current lane. You can switch lanes to target different enemies. Larger enemies can be hit using both fists, and can be hit repeatedly for more points. You have a green/red combo bar, which increases with sick or rad hits, and determines your rank. Your multiplayer bar is above the combo bar and applies a multiplier to note you hit.

Controls:

W S = Switch lanes

Down or right arrow key = rich punch

Up or left arrow key = left punch

Enter = start/pause

Tab = select/toggle nightcore in freeplay

Right Punch is makes a selections

Left Punch goes back

Start is pause

Select toggles nightcore in freeplay

Made in 2 weeks for the gxc notice me jam.

A game by Pikachurian MC_Creeper Kirbybowwow
